about_the_game:
New from TK. Projects is a fantastic pack of 100 orchestrated Music Events to put the perfect punctuation point on all your important events. Jam packed with lots of event endings including fanfares, comical, horror, music for getting items, mystery, happy and sad sounds, shock, save, sleep, story telling and more!

Features:

* 100 ME (Music Events) for royalty-free use
* OGG, M4A formats included
* ME for a variety of scenes in RPG fantasy and adventure, Visual Novel Maker and more!
* For use in RPG Makers and Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

SRMPC_ME001～005_BigFanfare 1～5
SRMPC_ME006～015_Fanfare 1～10
SRMPC_ME016～020_Happy 1～5
SRMPC_ME021～030_Comical 1～10
SRMPC_ME031～035_ItemGet 1～5
SRMPC_ME036～045_Horror 1～10
SRMPC_ME046～050_Incident 1～5
SRMPC_ME051～060_Mystery 1～10
SRMPC_ME061～065_Sad 1～5
SRMPC_ME066～070_Shock 1～5
SRMPC_ME071～075_Curse 1～5
SRMPC_ME076～080_Save 1～5
SRMPC_ME081～085_Sleep 1～5
SRMPC_ME086～100_Story 1～15
